attributes.action: Key workers should have Tax Free Income during Coronavirus time services.
attributes.additional_details:
There are so many doctors, nurses, health workers, teachers, transport workers and so many in other departments who are going out by the sake of their duties and responsibilities by putting their lives into risk and leaving their loving family behind.
Bearing their dedications in mind the government or parliament  should take initiative now to show their part of dedication and appreciation towards them. And they should make their income Free of Tax during the Coronavirus Peak Time services.
attributes.background: We urge to the Government or Parliament to make the Key Workers’ Income as Tax Free during their Coronavirus services.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
